events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position, and our team is excited to review your credentials carefully.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the software developer role you applied for.
A dedicated recruiter from our engineering hiring team has been assigned to assist you through the upcoming stages of the recruitment process.
Your initial screening interview has been successfully completed, and we appreciate the insights you provided about your software development experience.
Thank you for promptly responding to our follow-up questions; your enthusiasm for the engineering role is very encouraging.
We have scheduled your technical interview for May 20th, where our senior developers will assess your skills in software architecture and problem solving.
